name: Turn Back the Clocks 4
description:
Visit Turn Back the Clocks 4 at Levi D. Smith Games

Originally developed for 0hGame Jam from 2am to 2am on November 5, 2017 during the winter time change (one hour of real time). The objective is to shoot the balls and activate all of the clocks for a perfect bonus score.  Activate the clocks quickly to gain a bonus multiplier.  Red balls give a 2x bonus and yellow balls give a 5x bonus.  Enter your name to compete in the online leaderboard.

TurnBackTheClocks4Windows-0hGamezip - 0hGame compo version.

All other versions are post 0hGame, which I spent extra time to improving graphics, physics, and music.

Below is the live development stream for the 1GAM version.
